About Me

Hi! I’m Dennis Dangerfield. Due to an incident with a squirrel, I am legally not allowed to post my picture online. However, I would love to tell you about my work!

I am a videographer who records real people giving their authentic descriptions of the hit TV series, The Office. I find that describing The Office really releases the inner creativity of my subjects and allows them to imagine a world different from our own.

My work is posted under the “Posts” tab. Please feel free to look around!

If you feel inspired and want to send me your own heartfelt descriptions of The Office, please do! I love to see my work touching hearts and minds around the world. My email is dennis.dangerfield@aolhotmail.com
